segments.advisor_message: So, uh, can you tell me a bit about your job? I mean, what do you do, and, like, how does that affect your finances?
segments.client_message: Yeah, um, I work as a graphic designer, right? So, I actually, like, get paid about twenty-five hundred a month, and it's, um, kinda flexible, you know? Some months are better than others. Oh! And, like, I have a side gig too, just doing some freelance stuff, especially after hours and all. It, uh, helps cover expenses like my rent and whatnot.
